caption:
This photograph captures a male singer performing onstage. He is prominently in the frame, singing into a microphone attached to a stand that reaches toward his face. The singer appears engaged in his performance, depicted through his expressive face and slightly open mouth, suggesting he is in the midst of a song.

He has a striking appearance, featuring a neatly trimmed beard and a full mustache, with his notable afro hairstyle perfectly rounded. He is dressed in a colorful floral shirt under a lavishly detailed jacket adorned with large decorative buttons and a purple hue that stands out against the darker backdrop.

The lighting focuses mainly on his face and upper body, creating a spotlight effect, while the background is largely dark and indistinct, drawing all attention to him.

Overall, the image conveys a sense of passion and energy from the performer, highlighted by the vibrant styling and intense facial expression as he engages with his audience through music.
title: Black singer performs at the International Amphitheater in Chicago as part of the annual PUSH 'Black Expo' in the fall of 1973. The annual event showcases Black talent, educational opportunities, stars, art, and products to provide Blacks with an awareness of their heritage and capabilities, and help them towards a better life.
